resources.string:
•In the calendar section, you can switch between the previous and the next dates.
•In the mail section, you can send a new e-mail and see your unread e-mails.
•In the alarm section, you can set a new alarm.
•In the phone section, you can see your call log.
•In the messages section, you can send a new sms and see your unread sms.
•In the contacts section, you can see your phones contacts.
•In the weather section, you can type a city and see its current weather.
•In the traffic section, you can type 2 addresses and see the current traffic between them.
•In the news section, you can see Greece's current trending news.
•In the lists section, you can type out a list for you to read later.
•In the remote section, you can choose between opening and closing your lights and changing the settings of your air-conditioning unit.
